summary:
This mod adds Chocolate bars and coins!
they can be made at the cookingpot or you can type (help chocolate) in the console commands.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Chocolate bars and coins!
they can be made at the cookingpot or you can type (help chocolate) in the console commands.
The ingrediens right now is for the coins :1 gold ore and 1 salt pile 
for the bars 1 salt pile and 1 apple: 

 !But i will make better ingrediens as milk, sugar, and cocao!
author: clown414
